name: Ha Giang - the plateau of rock - journey for Roel
description:
Dong Van Karst Plateau Global Geo park in Ha Giang Province has many gigantic beautiful sceneries, special beautiful sites, diverse and endemic geological system, various groups of valuable and rare animals and vegetables, geological heritages at regional and international levels. This is really an attractive destination of scientists and tourists.

Highlights 

- Capture the splendid natural beauty in mountainous Ha Giang with the UNESCO world heritage.

- Watching the colorful blooming peach floowers in the scenery of Trinh Tuong houses.

- Catch the view of summer in the vast terrace fields covering the land.

- Surprise of violet of Tam Giac Mach flowers in October and November everywhere up hills.

- Discover the unique culture of local ethnic people there.

- Serve the specialties of Ha Giang which are found nowhere but there.

- Experience the different feeling of travel in each zig-zag route of Happiness Road.
